author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
Update PS-Committee membership

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT there are spelling errors in Linux CI, see: https://travis-ci.org/PowerShell/PowerShell/jobs/301685646.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
The Linux CI failed again with spelling errors :( 
```
The command "pwsh -File tools/travis.ps1" exited with 0.
1.55s$ if [[ "$TRAVIS_OS_NAME" == "linux" ]]; then mdspell '**/*.md' '!powershell/**/*.md' --ignore-numbers --ignore-acronyms --report; fi
    docs/community/governance.md
       30 | * Dongbo Wang ([daxian-dbw](https://gi 
       31 | * Jim Truher ([JamesWTruher](https://githu 
>> 2 spelling errors found in 72 files
```

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: Linux CI passed. I will merge this PR.

title: Update governance.md
